text:
OCT 15 1960
Oct. 13, I960
Toronto
Dr. Harold Hill
Dear Sir:
Dr. McLuhan wants these invoices and
statement sent to you.
Our former assistants records show *
these amounts paid. Nevertheless
we got this new invoice. Sept. 30,
reaching us only today.
Do your records also show payment
for 13538 and 13613? If so,
please indicate to Montreal.
We enclose our last official copies
of the invoices, so you now have
all the records concerned on these
two matters.
Sincerely,
